senses: [{"definition":"To receive, especially with a consent, with favour, or with approval.","example":null},{"definition":"To admit to a place or a group.","example":"The Boy Scouts were going to accept him as a member."},{"definition":"To regard as proper, usual, true, or to believe in.","example":"I accept the notion that Christ lived."},{"definition":"To receive as adequate or satisfactory.","example":null},{"definition":"To receive or admit to; to agree to; to assent to; to submit to.","example":"I accept your proposal, amendment, or excuse."},{"definition":"To endure patiently.","example":"I accept my punishment."},{"definition":"To agree to pay.","example":null},{"definition":"To receive officially.","example":"to accept the report of a committee"},{"definition":"To receive something willingly.","example":"I accept."},{"definition":"Accepted.","example":null}]
